---
category: news
title: "Deep learning–based virtual staining of tissue facilitates rapid assessment of breast cancer biomarker"
excerpt: "Breast cancer is one the leading causes of cancer death among women globally. Upon breast cancer diagnosis, the testing of HER2—a protein that promotes cancer cell growth, is routinely carried out to help assess the cancer prognosis and make HER2-directed treatment plans."
